name: footy-data-kit
description: Tools and scripts to gather, parse, and clean English football data for downstream use in other apps.

data.description: Raw scraped or collected football data before cleaning

dataOutput.description: Processed and cleaned data, ready for use in other apps

wikipedia.description: Scraping and generation scripts for Wikipedia-based datasets

tests.description: Jest unit tests covering season-building and division parsing logic

aiContext.purpose: Assist with data scraping, parsing, and transformation scripts for English football datasets.
aiContext.preferred_style: Functional, modular, and reusable Node.js scripts with clear CLI support.
focus: Structured CSV and JSON output generation
Unit testing coverage for data parsers
notes: Preserve reproducibility for historic datasets (pre and post-2000).
Make scripts idempotent and configurable by league/season.
Prefer fast, deterministic tests without hitting live Wikipedia.
